mapper.sql: settle_details_id, rebate_seq, rebate_bal, bu_code, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, row_id
mapper.insert:

settle_details_id,
rebate_seq,
rebate_bal,
bu_code,
created_by,
created_date,
last_updated_by,
last_updated_date,
row_id,

mapper.update:
update ac_rebate_queue
rebate_seq = #{rebateSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rebate_bal = #{rebateBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where settle_details_id = #{settleDetailsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ac_rebate_queue
rebate_seq = #{rebateSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rebate_bal = #{rebateBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_updated_by = #{currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_date = now(),
row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where settle_details_id = #{settleDetailsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ac_rebate_queue set rebate_seq = #{rebateSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rebate_bal = #{rebateBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where settle_details_id = #{settleDetailsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mc_order.order_no,mc_order.zone_code,sh_zone.zone_name,mc_member.member_id,mc_member.nick_name,mc_member.telephone,mc_member.member_grade,mc_member_grade.grade_name, case when ac_settle_batch.settle_zone='COM' then '支付时间' else '确认收货时间' end queueing_type, case when ac_settle_batch.settle_zone='COM' then mc_order.payment_time else mc_order.receipt_time end queueing_time, mc_order.amount, ac_rebate_queue.rebate_bal, (select sum(rebate_amt) hasRebateAmt from ac_rebate_details where ac_rebate_queue.settle_details_id=ac_settle_details.settle_details_id) hasRebateAmt from ac_rebate_queue inner join ac_settle_details on ac_rebate_queue.settle_details_id =ac_settle_details.settle_details_id inner join ac_settle_batch on ac_settle_details.settle_batch_id=ac_settle_batch.settle_batch_id inner join mc_order on ac_settle_details.order_id=mc_order.order_id inner join mc_member on mc_order.member_id=mc_member.member_id left join mc_member_grade on mc_member.member_grade=mc_member_grade.grade_code inner join sh_zone on mc_order.zone_code=sh_zone.zone_code order by ac_rebate_queue.rebate_seq

select sum(ac_rebate_queue.rebate_bal) rebate_bals,count(*) order_count,sum(ac_settle_batch.profit_bal) profit_bal from ac_rebate_queue inner join ac_settle_details on ac_rebate_queue.settle_details_id =ac_settle_details.settle_details_id inner join ac_settle_batch on ac_settle_details.settle_batch_id=ac_settle_batch.settle_batch_id inner join mc_order on ac_settle_details.order_id=mc_order.order_id order by ac_rebate_queue.rebate_seq
select max(rebate_seq) rebate_seq from ac_rebate_queue t
